overview: When Anna Claire Clouds' best friend slept with her boyfriend, she got the ultimate revenge by fucking her father! Hot Asian honor student Luna Mills was grateful when her BFF's dad tutored her for math class so she gave him some "A+" head and some of her sweet pussy! Brooke Johnson loves her bestie's dad because anytime she's feeling down he is happy to cheer her up with multiple orgasms! Rory Knox's best friend's daddy thought she was a bad influence until she sucked and fucked her way into his heart!
tagline: Don't leave your best friend alone with your dad!
